author: wn.com
title: RU Geology student earns professional recognition and experience » (Radford University)
text: ( Source : Radford University ) Senior geology major Robert Huber was recognized as a Martin L. Stout Scholarship recipient at the annual meeting of the Association of Engineering and Environmental Geologists' ( AEG ). AEG Foundation
